thread.title: This Star Wars toilet paper dispenser that sounds like Chewbacca's growl is the perfect Life Day gift
thread.title_full: This Star Wars toilet paper dispenser that sounds like Chewbacca's growl is the perfect Life Day gift

title: This Star Wars toilet paper dispenser that sounds like Chewbacca's growl is the perfect Life Day gift
text: 0 Fun News This Star Wars toilet paper dispenser that sounds like Chewbacca's growl is the perfect Life Day gift   19:49   Twitter Share on Google+ A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away, one Padawan stumbled on a familiar growl in a very unexpected place.If you've ever longed to hear the soothing sounds of Chewbacca 's growl while washing up, we have just the viral video for you.A surprising likeness, no? It might make for the perfect Life Day gift for your loved ones this year.We're not sure yet if this toilet paper dispenser is actually Chewbacca-approved. If not, how about a Jabba the Hutt loofah for washing up?There's also no word yet on if the Chewie-branded toilet paper will show up in Star Wars: The Force Awakens , out this December.Watch a trailer below:
